description.value:
1st level Bards get access to Bardic Magic, which consists of 1st through 7th level spells. However, you do not have access to all of them right away. These spell levels become accessible as follows:

Bard Spell Levels

Spell LevelUnlock Requirements
Level 1 Spells1st Level Bard.
Level 2 Spells2nd Level Bard;
3rd Level Overall.
Level 3 Spells3rd Level Bard;
5th Level Overall
(At least 4 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
Level 4 Spells4th Level Bard;
7th Level Overall
(At least 6 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
Level 5 Spells5th Level Bard;
9th Level Overall
(At least 8 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
Level 6 Spells6th Level Bard;
11th Level Overall
(At least 10 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
Level 7 Spells7th Level Bard;
13th Level Overall
(At least 12 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
